wikipedia_page.main: Edmund Graham Gibbons II   (10 March 1920 – 18 June 2016) was a Bermudian businessman and politician who served as the mayor of Hamilton from 1972 to 1988. Gibbons was the brother of the late Sir David Gibbons, the former Premier of Bermuda from 1977 until 1982.  Together, the Gibbons brothers owned and operated the Edmund Gibbons Ltd., a holding company, and its affiliated companies, for more than forty years.
